name: A Night Off
description:
Every year, Wuhan-Baxter invites all of its ARC teams to a sort of company picnic. They wine and dine the corps and then show off some new tech that is supposed to get the teams all jazzed up for their next missions. This year, right as they are unveiling the new prototype, there's a bright flash of light, and your team finds itself one hour in the past. If you can't figure out how to stop the Time Loop Iterations, reality will unravel and the universe will be destroyed.

Cheers!

“A Night Off” is an independent production of Jared Mason and is not affiliated with THE COMPANY or MEGACORP Games. It is published under THE COMPANY Third Party License. THE COMPANY is copyright MEGACORP Games and Wuhan Baxter LLC.
